item.description:
To celebrate the first day of summer, we have a function/meeting room in the area of historical Marblehead, right on the water.
Swimming, relaxing, mingle is OK. No life guards, and some rules on using the private beach and function hall. The place is picturesque. Come in the early afternoon, till around 9-10 pm. Bring your favorite food, beverage for a Pot luck/catering casual style event. If you play a musical instrument, take with you for an evening background and Summer theme tell and show to share!

http://www.calendar-u...

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: SUMMER SOLSTICE
